rows.label: qst102210_msg0001
rows.name:
What's your problem, kid?!
Can't you see we're all exhausted?

rows.label: qst102210_msg0002
rows.name:
You let them all die again,
didn't you?!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0003
rows.name:
Just like when you killed my
mum and dad in Gula!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0004
rows.name: What are you talking about...?

rows.label: qst102210_msg0005
rows.name: Gula?

rows.label: qst102210_msg0006
rows.name: But... It can't be... You're their...?

rows.label: qst102210_msg0007
rows.name: I had no idea... You've grown so much...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0008
rows.name: Nis? What is this about?

rows.label: qst102210_msg0009
rows.name:
This boy is absolutely right.
I left my comrades to die, and
saved my own hide.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0010
rows.name:
I don't know what happened in
Gula, but you're not to blame
for what happened here today.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0011
rows.name:
Get out! Out of this village!
I don't want to see you ever again!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0012
rows.name:
Yes...you're right. If I stay here,
I'll just get someone killed again.
Someone like Corden...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0013
rows.name:
What in the...?! Hey you, help me out
here. What should I do with this guy?

rows.label: qst102210_msg0014
rows.name: (What should I say?)

rows.label: qst102210_msg0015
rows.name: Let them do as they wish.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0016
rows.name: Nis should stay in Hræsvelgr.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0101
rows.name: Then it's settled. I'm leaving.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0102
rows.name:
If I meet you outside this village,
I'll use my dad's Blade and...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0103
rows.name:
By all means.
You have the right.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0104
rows.name:
If I'd only died alone back then,
none of this would have happened.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0105
rows.name: But, Nis...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0106
rows.name:
It's all right, Kathira.
Thank you for everything.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0107
rows.name:
I'm sure I won't meet you guys
again, either.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0108
rows.name:
I never did get to hear your
tales about Vandham-san...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0109
rows.name:
But I know he thought highly
of you guys.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0110
rows.name:
If you're supporting me in this,
I know it's the right thing to do.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0111
rows.name: Farewell, everyone.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0112
rows.name:
Now I just need to grow up
and become a great Driver!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0113
rows.name: I swear I'll avenge my parents someday!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0114
rows.name:
Vandham preferred to look to the
future rather than dwell on the past...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0115
rows.name:
But I guess there's nobody left to tell
us if this was the right choice any more.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0201
rows.name:
Well...I guess Vandham-san did think
highly of you guys. If you say so,
it must be the right choice.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0202
rows.name:
I don't think I can ever repent for
what I've done, but I'll devote my
life to helping the people of Hræsvelgr.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0203
rows.name: Whaaaat?! No way!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0204
rows.name:
Vandham didn't like to dwell
on things in the past...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0205
rows.name:
But if you're going to stay here,
I think you need to have a proper
talk with this boy.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0206
rows.name: You're right. I'll tell him everything.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0207
rows.name: What an awful tale...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0208
rows.name:
You should never have returned
to the camp.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0209
rows.name: Now, see here, young man!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0210
rows.name:
It's all right, Kathira.
I often tell myself the same thing.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0211
rows.name:
Why won't you expel him from
the village?! I don't get you
grown-ups at all!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0212
rows.name:
I'll avenge my parents one day!
With my dad's Blade in hand!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0213
rows.name: Thank you for doing that.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0214
rows.name:
I believe Vandham would have
done the same.
